description: Labeled corpus for PII scanner accuracy evaluation (Story 1.7). 50 PII-positive + 50 clean chunks.

clean.text: Q3 revenue increased by 14% compared to the same period last year.
The new Kubernetes deployment uses a blue-green strategy for zero-downtime upgrades.
Sprint retrospective notes: team velocity improved after adopting async stand-ups.
The search index was rebuilt overnight; BM25 recall improved by 8%.
Ollama nomic-embed-text achieved p95 latency of 120ms on the M2 MacBook.
FalkorDB schema updated to include valid_at timestamp on all MENTIONS edges.
The Python packaging guide recommends using pyproject.toml over setup.py.
PostgreSQL 17 introduces incremental sort optimisation for ORDER BY queries.
Ruff replaced flake8 and isort; configuration lives in pyproject.toml.
The project uses pytest-asyncio for testing async FastAPI endpoints.
Docker Compose v3 health checks use interval, timeout, and retries fields.
The outbox pattern ensures FalkorDB writes are atomic with Postgres transactions.
Textual 0.80 introduced reactive variables that auto-refresh the TUI on change.
The vector index uses HNSW with m=16 and ef_construction=64 for recall-latency balance.
CrossEncoder reranker loads lazily on first query call using functools.lru_cache.
Alembic env.py configured to read POSTGRES_URL from environment variables.
pgvector 0.8.1 supports parallel HNSW index builds with maintenance_work_mem=2GB.
The kanban board was migrated from Jira to Linear for faster issue triaging.
Wikilinks in vault-sync use [[Person/Name]] format for Obsidian graph view.
BM25 scoring uses ts_rank with the GIN tsvector index for sub-10ms queries.
The staging environment resets every Monday morning at 03:00 UTC via cron.
SHA-256 deduplication prevents reprocessing the same file dropped twice.
The MCP server exposes search_facts and search_nodes tools over HTTP/SSE.
Reciprocal Rank Fusion with k=60 combines BM25 and ANN ranked lists.
The Makefile 'make audit' target runs Trivy container image vulnerability scans.
psycopg3 uses conn.execute().fetchone() instead of the psycopg2 fetchrow() method.
Structlog outputs JSON-formatted logs with bound context at each log site.
The embedding worker uses FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED to prevent double-picking rows.
Vault files are written with chmod 444 to prevent accidental overwrites.
Prometheus metrics are scraped every 15 seconds; alert threshold at 200 chunks backlog.
The sales team closed 23 enterprise deals in the first half of the fiscal year.
Engineering on-call rotation follows a weekly schedule with a 15-minute response SLA.
The architecture decision record was approved by the platform team lead.
CI runs on every pull request; failure gates on unit tests and lint checks.
The product roadmap for H2 prioritises search quality over new data connectors.
Watchfiles awatch() provides cross-platform filesystem event detection.
The TUI footer shows all active keybindings using Textual BINDINGS auto-render.
pdfminer.six extracts plain text from PDFs including multi-column layouts.
Jaro-Winkler distance with a 0.90 threshold governs entity resolution merges.
The dead-letter queue retries failed outbox events up to 10 times before marking dead.
Container images are based on python:3.12-slim for minimal surface area.
The config table stores rrf_k, embed_model, bm25_weight, and vector_weight.
Semantic versioning is used: major.minor.patch format for all service images.
Backup restore tested weekly with make test-backup-restore on a dummy dataset.
The graph database stores Document and Person nodes with MENTIONS and SENT_TO edges.
Rate limiting is enforced at 100 requests per minute per API key via middleware.
Chunk overlap of 50 tokens was validated as optimal in the Sprint 1 embedding spike.
The ingest worker processes PDF, MBOX, and Markdown files from the drop-zone.
API keys are prefixed with 'pkg_' for easy identification in logs and configs.
The TUI dashboard shows ingest queue depth, outbox depth, and dead-letter count.
